DOC.brief_title: ONYX-015 With Cisplatin Fluorouracil Treating Patients With Advanced Head Neck Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine feasibility maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) intraarterial ONYX-015 patient advance squamous cell cancer head neck . II . Determine feasibility tolerability intraarterial ONYX-015 MTD OR maximum theraputic dose , whichever low , combination intravenous cisplatin fluorouracil patient . III . Determine qualitative distribution ONYX-015 within limited tumor biopsy normal mucosal biopsy different dose level . IV . Determine response patient intraarterial ONYX-015 . V. Determine response patient cisplatin fluorouracil follow intraarterial ONYX-015 . PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This dose escalation study . Patients receive intraarterial infusion ONYX-015 . Treatment repeat 3-4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 3-8 patient receive escalate dos ONYX-015 maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . The MTD define dose precede 2 5 patient experience dose limit toxicity . Patients cohorts 1-4 follow 5 day infusion , weekly 3 week , week 6 , monthly thereafter 4 month . A fifth final cohort 10 patient receive ONYX-015 MTD . If MTD determine cohort 1-4 , patient receive high dose administer cohort 4 . Beginning 1-2 day ONYX-015 infusion , patient receive cisplatin IV 30-60 minute fluorouracil IV continuously 4 day . Treatment repeat 4 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cisplatin fluorouracil IV treatment continue every 3-4 week discretion treat oncologist . Patients cohort 5 follow 5 day initial infusion , weekly 4 week , week 8 , monthly thereafter 4 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 23-28 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA : Disease Characteristics Histologically confirm squamous cell carcinoma head neck ( SCCHN ) incurable standard therapy Measurable evaluable disease Multiple SCCHN primary allow Metastases allow tumor treat confined head neck region Prior/Concurrent Therapy Biologic therapy : Recovered prior biologic therapy Chemotherapy : At least 3 week since prior chemotherapy recover Endocrine therapy : Recovered prior endocrine therapy Radiotherapy : At least 12 week since prior radiotherapy recover Surgery : Recovered prior surgery Other : Recovered prior diagnostic theraputic procedure Patient Characteristics Age : 18 physiologic 79 Performance status : ECOG 02 Life expectancy : Over 3 month Hematopoietic : WBC great 3,000/mm3 OR Absolute neutrophil count great 2,000/mm3 ; Platelet count great 100,000/mm3 ; Hemoglobin great 10 g/dL ( transfusion allow use solely meet eligibility criterion ) Hepatic : SGOT le 2.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; Alkaline phosphatase less 3 time ULN ; Bilirubin great 1.5 time ULN Renal : Creatinine le 1.6 mg/dL OR Creatinine clearance great 50 mL/min Cardiovascular : No active cardiovascular disease would limit physical activity ( i.e. , ability walk 50 foot without stop ) Pulmonary : No active pulmonary disease would limit physical activity ( i.e. , ability walk 50 foot without stop ) Other : No prior concurrent malignancy within past 3 year except limited basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin carcinoma situ cervix ; Adequate nutritionally balance enteral intake least 1,800 kcal/day ( enteral feeding tube dependent allow ) ; No intravenous alimentation primary source calorie ; No serious illness medical condition would preclude study ( i.e. , active systemic lupus erythematosus , Crohn 's disease AIDS ) ; No prior immunodeficiency ( i.e. , HIV infection , organ transplant , chronic steroid use ) ; Not pregnant nursing ; Negative pregnancy test ; Fertile patient must use effective contraception
